summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative logs related to Jeffrey Epstein's suicide watch at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York. It includes an Inmate Companions Log, Suicide Watch Chronological Log, Inmate History, and detailed observation logs from July 23-30, 2019, documenting his status and the 15-minute checks by staff.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The inmate who is the subject of the suicide watch logs at MCC New York. The logs track his status, transfer to psych observation, and detailed 15-minute observations.

persons.name: Associate Warden MCC New York
persons.context: Official who is copied on or authorizes the Inmate Companions Log entry regarding the utilization of an inmate companion for Epstein.

connections.description: The Associate Warden is a supervisory official at the facility where Epstein is incarcerated and under suicide watch.

events.title: Suicide Watch Begins for Epstein
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is placed on suicide watch at MCC New York at 1:40 AM.

events.title: Inmate Companion Duty
events.description: An inmate companion is assigned to watch Epstein from 7:00 AM on July 23 until 8:45 AM on July 24.

events.title: Transfer to Psych Observation
events.description: Epstein is transferred from general suicide watch to psych observation at 8:45 AM.

events.title: Psych Observation Ends
events.description: Epstein's period in psych observation concludes at 8:15 AM.

locations: MCC New York, 150 Park Row, New York, NY
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was placed on suicide watch at MCC New York on July 23, 2019, at 1:40 AM.
An inmate companion was assigned to watch him from July 23 at 7:00 AM until July 24 at 8:45 AM.
Epstein was transferred to psych observation on July 24, 2019, at 8:45 AM, where he remained until July 30 at 8:15 AM.
The documents are official Bureau of Prisons logs detailing 15-minute observational checks on Epstein during this critical period.
The logs originate from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, where Epstein was held pre-trial.
